about_the_game:
Welcome to CHAINED BACKROOMS — a unique cooperative horror-action game where players are chained together and must explore the eerie Backrooms as a team.

Game Features:

  • Players Chained Together: Players are physically linked by a chain, complicating interactions with the environment and requiring seamless teamwork.

  • Seven Unique Levels: Each level offers a mini-adventure with original gameplay, puzzles, various creatures, and collectible items.

  • Cooperative Multiplayer: Explore the Backrooms with up to four players. Proximity-based voice chat enhances the realism of interactions.

  • Flawless Network Code: Even with high ping, you'll enjoy a smooth gameplay experience.

Players must not only solve tasks and evade dangerous entities but also maintain their sanity. How to recover it? Give your teammate a good slap to snap them back to reality!

  • Cooperative Multiplayer: Explore the Backrooms with up to four players. Proximity-based voice chat enhances the realism of interactions.

  • Flawless Network Code: Even with high ping, you'll enjoy a smooth gameplay experience.

Players must not only solve tasks and evade dangerous entities but also maintain their sanity. How to recover it? Give your teammate a good slap to snap them back to reality!
name: Chained Backrooms

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: 2.4GHz Dual-Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any with 1GB
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: 4GHz Quad-Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any with 3GB
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

short_description: CHAINED BACKROOMS is a horror game where players are chained together, forced to survive and explore procedurally generated Backrooms levels. Only coordinated teamwork can help avoid dangers and find an escape. Co-op for 2-4 players.
